Frame:Visual evaluation

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss Visual evaluation
Transcription
Description Evaluator's evaluation of a thing based upon its visually-accessible features
Closest FrameNet Frame(s)
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
Other aliases

Role Name: evaluee
Role Type: object
Definition/Comments:
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: visible part of evaluee
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: part of evaluee which can be seen
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: visible properties
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: properties of visible part of evaluee
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: expected visible properties
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: standard by which object is evaluated
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: evaluation_outcome
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: determination of whether visible properties are those expected
FrameNet Role:
Role Name: difficulties in evaluating
Role Type:
Definition/Comments: things or processes that prevent or impact the act of evaluation
FrameNet Role:
